coexistence_simulator.radar.signal_processing.cfar

Cell‑Averaging CFAR detector for one‑dimensional magnitude vectors.

The helper contains no dependencies beyond NumPy, making it suitable for unit tests and quick prototyping.

Example

```python import numpy as np import matplotlib.pyplot as plt from coexistence_simulator.radar.signal_processing.cfar import ca_cfar_1d

rng_prof = np.random.randn(256) * 0.5 rng_prof[100] += 10 # Inject a strong target.

det_mask, thresh = ca_cfar_1d(rng_prof, num_train=8,

num_guard=2, pfa=1e-3)

plt.plot(rng_prof) plt.plot(thresh, “–“) plt.plot(np.where(det_mask)[0], rng_prof[det_mask], “rx”) plt.show() ```

Functions

ca_cfar_1d(mag[, num_train, num_guard, pfa])

Perform one‑dimensional Cell‑Averaging CFAR detection.
